name: Bespoke Wedding Photography by Jacqueline
description:
All my wedding packages are bespoke and specifically tailored around you and your needs. Please contact me prior to booking and payment to discuss your requirements. Prints, Framing & Albums are available at an additional cost. All print products provided by the award-winning Loxley Colour.

Love You: £1,250

* An initial meeting to discuss your big day.
* Coverage of the ceremony, wedding breakfast & reception (all day).
* An online gallery of all the final images.

Our Love: £1,595

* An initial meeting to discuss your big day
* Bride & Groom pre-wedding shoot.
* Guest Signing Frame for your big day.
* Coverage of the ceremony, wedding breakfast & reception (all day).
* An online gallery of all the final images.

All My Love: £1,995

* An initial meeting to discuss your big day.
* Bride & Groom pre-wedding shoot.
* Guest Signing Frame for your big day.
* Coverage of the ceremony, wedding breakfast & reception (all day).
* An online gallery of all the final images with download facility and licence for unlimited personal use.
* A wedding album of 25 pages (maximum).

.............................................................................................................

* All final images will be available to purchase from a secure online portfolio with password
* Vouchers are valid for 6 months from date of purchase. No refund will be made if the voucher is not used within this time.

If you have any further queries please feel free to email me at jacqueline@jacquelineallott.co.uk.

name: Children's Photography by Jacqueline
description:
Children grow and change so quickly so why not book a portrait session especially for them?

On-location shooting is not only beneficial in terms of being able to choose a beautiful background, you can also make it much more personal by choosing somewhere that's been important to you. When it comes to photographing children - particularly your younger ones - there's infinitely more for them to interact with.

In addition to the above, location shooting feels so much more natural (and relaxing) than studio sessions, particularly if anyone is camera shy.

Develop a theme with your children, bring a picnic, go mad with bubbles! It's all about their smiles. Whatever you decide to do, you'll receive a photographic blow-by-blow account (at least 10 images).

Alternatively, a studio session may be booked for babies and toddlers. Bring their favourite outfit and/or cuddly toy.
--------------------------------------------------

Additional Information:

* All photoshoots take place on location (agreed by the client when organising a date). 
* The price covers photoshoots taking place within the Sheffield/Barnsley area. Any additional travel expenses will need to be subsidised. 
* A Children's Photo shoot should last approximately 1 hour. 
* All final images will be available to purchase from a secure online portfolio with password. 
* Parents must accompany their children throughout the session. 
* Vouchers are valid for 6 months from date of purchase. No refund will be made if the voucher is not used within this time.

If you have any further enquiries, please feel free to email me at jacqueline@jacquelineallott.co.uk

name: Teenagers and Prom Photography by Jacqueline
description:
No idea what to buy the teenager in your life? How about a confidence boosting photoshoot?

This mini modelling experience will provide them with make-up & styling advice, posing guidance, and the beginnings of a professional model portfolio. Who knows where it may take them!

There are three shoot options available:

Option 1: - A Photoshoot without make-up artist/hairdresser

* 1 hour session
* Initial Style Consultation
* One Outfit
* Online Gallery of Best images
* Full Image Retouching
* One Free 10x8 Print

Option 2:- A Photoshoot without make-up artist/hairdresser

* 1.5 hour session
* Initial Style Consultation
* Two Outfit Changes
* Online Gallery of Best images
* Full Image Retouching
* Two Free 10x8 Print


Option 3:- A Photoshoot with a make-up artist/hairdresser

* 3 hour session
* Initial Style Consultation
* Three Outfit Changes
* Online Gallery of Best images
* Full Image Retouching
* Three Free 10x8 Prints

--------------------------------------------------

Additional Information:

* All photoshoots take place on location (agreed by the client when organising a date). 
* The price covers photoshoots taking place within the Sheffield/Barnsley area. Any additional travel expenses will need to be subsidised. 
* All final images will be available to purchase from a secure online portfolio with password 
* Vouchers are valid for 10 months from date of purchase. No refund will be made if the voucher is not used within this time.

If you have any further enquiries, please feel free to email me at jacqueline@jacquelineallott.co.uk
